website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, compact espresso machine with self-priming system, so it's always ready to go when you are.
pros: We love how slim and streamlined this machine is
Great for anyone needing to save on counter space
The easy-to-use control panel has just three buttons
Its 3-in-1 filter holder can serve single shots, double shots, and "Easy Serving" espresso pods

customer_reviews.title: not worth it

customer_reviews.title: Keeps up with the coffee fiends in the office.  Good value.  Work horse.
customer_reviews.text: This expresso machine was purchased for our office kitchenette to serve between 8-10 people on a daily basis. It is getting heavy use, and so far is working perfectly. Milk steamer is easy to use and easy to clean. Just be sure to read the instructions when switching from steamer to espresso mode--you have to allow for the machine to cool down or restart the machine to go back to espresso mode. Very happy with the performance, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bressler

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, read the instruction.
customer_reviews.text: It was touch and go after I gave this machine to my dad. It started doing weird things 2 days after the first use and I was going to get rid of it but, I’ll admit fault on my part, I didn’t fully read the instructions. Once I programmed the quantity of coffee to pour it was all good. Oh and if your machine is leaking coffee from the top, your packing in too much damn coffee. I learned the hard way. Don’t pay too much attention to the negative comments. Read the damn instructions when you get it, play with some of the settings and it’ll make awesome espresso for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Marotta

customer_reviews.title: Another Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Best espresso machine I have ever owned. Well worth the cost. Fits niceless next to Keurig machine on counter and black matches other appliances well. Produces a nice crema in a single or double shot. Steam/frothing wand works great and disassembles easily for good cleaning after each use. Manufacturers directions for basic and advanced functions such as shot temp settings and water soft or hard setting are well explained. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Sturdy, but it's still a two handed process to work the machine and hold it in place when inserting or taking out the coffee holder/handle. I only use it for a double cappuccino without milk, so I don't even use the frothing device. That being said, there is something satisfying about the coffee strength, the heat of the coffee from the machine, and the pure joy of feeling like a badass barista in your own kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: LES G TRENT

customer_reviews.title: I Love Espresso
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful machine. I love this bad boy! Easy to use and it produces quality that you find in professional establishments. It works consistently and efficiently every time no matter how many espresso's or other beverages are being made. So far over 100 drinks with absolutely no problems whatsoever. If you are looking for a great espresso machine this is the one. Great value and nice to look at. DeLonghi has done a marvelous job on this machine. Wish I had stock in this guy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Ruckman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee in very small portions
customer_reviews.text: This product requires a learning curve to feel satisfied. Not following the directions fully can cause frustration with the product. For instance, if just slightly too much coffee is loaded, the machine will not close properly. It makes a very small amount of coffee — there would never be a reason to use the single setting, as you might end up with a 1/4 cup of coffee. The coffee maker needs to be descaled fairly often, so you will be a slave to its products. Coffee is delicious though.

customer_reviews.title: The instructions say it will take a few cups to brew the perfect cup, but I've brewed 4 and each cup ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm not impressed. After my old Krups, which lasted 14 years in an office setting, finally died, I decided on the Delonghi. I have yet to make a cup with any crema. Each cup tastes slightly burned and bitter. I'm not sure if I'll be keeping this. The instructions say it will take a few cups to brew the perfect cup, but I've brewed 4 and each cup is as poor as the last. I was also disappointed that the machine came without the filter, which according to the instructions should have been included in the package. Vey disappointed
